dictionary.500: There was an internal server error. Please contact support.
dictionary.options-update-error: Your changes couldn't be saved! Please contact support as we would like to help you.
dictionary.options-language-updated: You are now using english language.
dictionary.options-build-denied: You can't do that, go into build-mode.
dictionary.savepoint-unlocked: You unlocked the Save-Point %NAME%! Use /savepoints to travel back here anytime.
dictionary.expected-number: The ID must be a number!
dictionary.savepoint-delete-error: The Save-Point %ID% couldn't be deleted! Please ensure that it exists (/savepoints list) and the associated json file is valid.
dictionary.savepoint-create-error: The save-point couldn't be created! Please contact the administrator or check the logs if possible.
dictionary.unknown-item-identifier: No item was found with the identifier {0}.
dictionary.invalid-amount: Your given amount is invalid (input a number!)
dictionary.unknown-shop-type: Invalid shop-type Expected: SELL, BUY, BOTH
dictionary.shop-create-success: The shop has been created successfully. ID: %SHOP_ID%
dictionary.shop-create-error: The shop could not be created!
dictionary.shop-discount: There currently is a bonus / discount!
dictionary.admin-sound-invalid: The given sound name / category is not valid.
dictionary.unknown-account-name: No account was found with this name.
dictionary.friend-request-already: You have already sent {0} a friend-request.
dictionary.friend-request-received: You have received a friend-request from %PLAYER_NAME%.
dictionary.friend-request-to-self: You can't be friends with yourself.
dictionary.friend-removed: You have removed {0} as your friend.
